name: Shikanosuke
text: Alright, let's goー...wait, where are we going?

name: Hebiko
text: There's fighting everywhere! Helping them all would take forever.

name: Me
text: Hmmm...
If we got caught up in the heat of the battle, we would be playing right into the enemy's hand. I took a deep breath and looked around the academy, which had completely turned into a battlefield.

name: Me
text: It might look unorganized at first glance, but... they're deliberately creating chaos.

name: Hebiko
text: There clearly aren't even that many actual enemies.

name: Me
text: Which is probably why they also tried to force Shikanosuke to join them.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Whaaa? Explain it like I'm five!

name: Hebiko
text: If they attacked the academy head-on, they'd be quickly outnumbered... That's why they're creating chaos and recruiting turncoats.

name: Hebiko
text: So that it's hard to distinguish who's an enemy and who's an ally, right?

name: Me
text: Yeah. It's a common but effective tactic.

name: Shikanosuke
text: I see... B-But it's not like they rebelled just to cause chaos here, did they? What's their real goal?

name: Me
text: Oooh, Shikanosuke, you're a sharp one, aren't you? If they want this rebellion to succeed, there's only one way to do it.

name: Shikanosuke
text: H-How, Fuma!?

name: Me
text: They have to attack and defeat Igawa Asagi, the current Taimanin Chief Commander.

name: Shikanosuke
text: A-A-Attack Headmistress Asagi...!?
Asagi-sensei was the headmistress of Gosha Academy, and at the same time she was the Chief Commander of the Taimanin. She was the mightiest Taimanin.
If they wanted to succeed with such a small number of combatants, subduing her was their best bet.

name: Hebiko
text: At this time Asagi-sensei should be in her office. That means they diverted everyone's attention to the chaos in order to attack the academy building while it's only lightly guarded.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Th-Then we have to protect the headmistress!
Shikanosuke looked up toward the headmistress's office. It seemed like he really meant it when he called himself the Taimanin of Justice.

name: Hebiko
text: Calm down, Shikanosuke-chan. Hebiko can't imagine she would be defeated that easily.

name: Me
text: Yeah. But if Gaiza is behind all of this then I'll have to stop him.

name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan...
It's not that I cared about the whole clan head and retainer thing.
But thinking back on it, Gaiza had been a bit different today from his usual self.

name: Me
text: (Gaiza had been brooding over something. And I can't really say that I'm not at least partly to blame.)

name: Hebiko
text: Rebels from within the Fuma Clan... this has really turned into a hassle.

name: Me
text: Well, it's not like everything's confirmed yet. But we have to hurry!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Are we going to run through all this chaos!?

name: Me
text: No, that's what they want us to do. Let's take a detour through the forest behind the academy building.
